interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2 Pack Foundation Full Coverage Liquid Foundation, Foundation Primer, 4 Makeup Sponge, Cosmetic Bag, 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer Foundation (Nude #102+Buff Beige #104)
Review Date: 2021/07/25
Store: Onkessy
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Color': 'Beige', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup Sponge', 'Product Dimensions': '7.48 x 0.79 x 5.51 inches; 8.47 Ounces'}
Review Text: I got this product because it said it was a nude color, which I normally get. The nude color for this brand is lighter than some other products. It didn't really match my face. Other than that, this product felt nice on my face. I have sensitive skin and it did make me break out after using it. I would recommend this, just know that the color is a little lighter than other brands.
Review Title: A good foundation.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog
JOYYUM
{'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'}
Do not like it. It barely spun or you have to use it with a very very small section of hair. Well, it's easy to use but I guess it's great for people with short hair.
Not for me
GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray, 4.3 oz. - Hemp Seed Oil, Aloe Vera, Frankincense Helps Stimulate Moisturize & Revitalize Damaged Hair, No Parabens, Color Safe, Lauryl & Laureth Sulfate Free
GIOVANNI
['GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray creates gloss that rocks, with a smooth surface that talks. This Mist will seal in any hairstyle, bridging the gap between natural and salon quality. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care* lines in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.*According to SPINs.']
{'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control, Shine', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Frankincense', 'Liquid Volume': '5.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 4.75 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '18640', 'UPC': '716237186409', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/GIOR7', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
I like this hair conditioner. It smells ok. After first use, my hair was very soft and smooth. It is so easy to rinse off too.
Parabens and Sulfate Free hair conditioner
FRESHME Facial Sheet Masks - Hydrating Face Mask Allantoin Sodium Hyaluronate Aloe Vera and Punica Granatum Fruit Extract Moisturizing Plant Facial Mask, Combo 6 Pack
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 3.94 x 0.91 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
I like these facial sheet mask. I used it for the first time last night before bed, it was easy to put it on my face. The essence absorbed into my skin quite fast, it didn't leave my face feeling dry at all. My face felt so smooth in the morning. However, instructions on the back of the packet didn't tell you how long you have to leave the mask on your face, I guess at least 15 minutes?
Facial sheet masks
NEW Challenger Men's Rinse Free Hand Wash - 1oz - Portable, 30% Alcohol Hand Wash both Cleans & Moisturizes. Hydrates Hands, Forearms, & Skin - Cleansing 30% Alc. Based Formula Washes and Nourishes
Challenger
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Challenger', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '851264008338'}
This handwash is great! It didn't not make my hands feel wo dry and it smell so good.
Great buy!
AIKIMUSE 10 Piece Nude Matte Pigmented Lipstick Set,Gifts for Women,Velvet Lip Kit Gift Set With Moisturizer Smooth,Waterproof Long Lasting Beauty Cosmetics Makeup Liquid Lipstick Set,8.8 oz
AIKIMUSE
{'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid,Creamy', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Smoothening,Moisturizing,Clean,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '7.44 x 7.05 x 3.11 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'UPC': '887349696053'}
Nice set of lipsticks! I love the packaging, it's very cute. The lipsticks in box set A is more of red colors and orange/coral color in box set B. The lipstick is very creamy, matte but it doesn't feel dry on my lips at all. But you definitely have to re-apply your lips after eating or drinking. And no these lipsticks aren't Nude color.
Good sets of matte lipsticks
AIKIMUSE New Nude Eyeshadow Palette with 18 Pigment-Rich Shades, Gifts for Women,Long Lasting Wear Waterproof Multi Reflective Shimmer Matte Glitter Eye Shadow Makeup, Natural Velvet Texture Eye Shaow, Cruelty-Free
AIKIMUSE
{'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Glitter,Shimmer,Matte,Velvet,Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '9.13 x 4.88 x 1.81 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '887349693397'}
The colors are easy to blend. Beautiful palette of eyeshadow colors. I love the colors and they are very pigmented.
Beautiful palette
2 Pack Foundation Full Coverage Liquid Foundation, Foundation Primer, 4 Makeup Sponge, Cosmetic Bag, 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer Foundation (Nude #102+Buff Beige #104)
Onkessy

I got this product because it said it was a nude color, which I normally get. The nude color for this brand is lighter than some other products. It didn't really match my face. Other than that, this product felt nice on my face. I have sensitive skin and it did make me break out after using it. I would recommend this, just know that the color is a little lighter than other brands.
A good foundation.
